column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi John - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you did not enjoy our ramen. If you're ever dissatisfied with our food for any reason
column2: please let your server know so he or she can offer something else or remove it from your tab. Otherwise
column3: can you provide more specific details as to why you felt our food was "disgusting"? We work very hard to provide a quality product that a large majority of Houstonians and visitors to Houston seem to enjoy. So whenever we miss the mark with a patron
column4: our livelihood depends on finding out what was wrong. On behalf of our entire staff
column5: we thank you for your feedback.
